title: The Origin Story
description: In the year 2839, the powerful criminal Mon*Star has escaped from prison, and it is up to the newly minted SilverHawks to put a stop to him and his gang.

title: Journey to Limbo
description: The Silverhawks explore Limbo and attack Mon*Star, forcing him back to his stronghold Brim*Star.

title: The Planet Eater
description: The Silverhawks must stop the Mon*Star group from using their terrifying Sky Chomper, a ship which eats other ships whole.

title: Save the Sun
description: The mob takes control of Limbo's artificial sun, and the Silverhawks prepare to launch a counterattack.

title: Stop Timestopper
description: The Mob invites a boy with an impressive power - the ability to stop time - to join their rebellion.

title: Darkbird
description: A bandit who bears an uncanny resemblance to Quicksilver attacks the bank of Limbo.

title: The Backroom
description: The Stargazers investigate a Mob machine that has the power to destroy every planet of Limbo Galaxy.

title: The Threat of Dritt
description: The Silverhawks protect an alien ambassador from the Mob, which wants to prevent the signing of a peace treaty.

title: Magnetic Attraction
description: Steelheart escorts a prisoner to the penal planet, but runs into Mon*star interference.

title: Gold Shield
description: The Mob sets out to steal the Disintegrator, a weapon that makes inanimate objects fall apart.

title: Zero the Memory Thief
description: The Silverhawks race to prevent the Mob from launching a Mega-Missile aimed at Earth.

title: The Milk Run
description: Mon*star battles to get Melodia back as she's being transported to the Penal Planet by SilverHawks.

title: The Hardware Trap: Part 1
description: Quicksilver goes undercover as a bandit to catch Hardware. First of a two-part episode.

title: The Hardware Trap: Part 2
description: Quicksilver chases an escaped Hardware on a sabotaged Sprinthawk, unaware that his vehicle is rigged to explode. Second of a two-part episode.

title: Race Against Time
description: Mon*star breaks Poker-Face out of prison to officiate over his meteor race.

title: Operation Big Freeze
description: The Silverhawks try to reverse Mon*star's galactic ice storm, which is threatening to ice over the entire Limbo Galaxy.

title: The Ghost Ship
description: Mon*star uses a Trojan Horse to get inside Silverhawk headquarters.

title: The Great Galaxy Race
description: The Mob challenges the SilverHawks to a long-distance race around the galaxy.

title: Fantascreen
description: Hardware devises a machine that can turn Silverhawks into mindless Mob slaves.

title: Hotwing Hits Limbo
description: As Mob victories pile up, Stagazer calls for more SilverHawk volunteers from Earth, and gets Hotwing, a SilverHawk with magic talent.

title: The Bounty Hunter
description: The Mob breaks The Bounty Hunter out of prison, and sets this brain-draining vampire/mercenary on the SilverHawks.

title: Zeek's Fumble
description: Poker-Face acquires sensitive information about the Silverhawks' defenses and prepares to sell it to Mon*star.

title: The Fighting Hawks
description: The Steel Twins devise new weapons, the Fighting Hawks, which are specially-powered versions of each SilverHawk's favorite tool, just in time for Mon*star's attack on the planet Automata.

title: The Renegade Hero
description: The Mob takes over Bedlam, and prepares to overthrow Limbo.

title: One on One
description: Steelheart goes to Brim*Star to stop the production of SilverHawk clones, and falls into a trap.

title: No More Mr. Nice Guy
description: Frustrated at having to put down a rebellion at Sini*Star before he can rob a Bullion Ship, Mon*Star agrees to transform sidekick Yes-Man into a superpowered tough guy.

title: Music of the Spheres
description: The passage of Halley's Comet throws Limbo into chaos as the Mob tries to thwart Steelheart's plan to send the comet crashing through Brim*Star.

title: Limbo Gold Rush
description: Space Bandit jumps a gold claim on Automata, setting off a fight between the Mob and the SilverHawks.

title: Countdown to Zero
description: Mon*Star sends Zero to infiltrate Automata and drain Monotone's computer memory.

title: The Amber Amplifier
description: Mo-Lec-U-Lar steals a device which amplifies the sun's power, and gives it to Hardware to use as a super-weapon.

title: The Saviour Stone
description: The Mob robs a mail rocket in search of the Savior Stone, which is Earth's only hope of restoring her decaying magnetic fields.

title: Smiley
description: Poker-Face sets up boxing matches at the Starship Casino, and puts a robot called Smiley in the ring with Mumbo-Jumbo.

title: Gotbucks
description: Gotbuck, a security robot, tests the bank's defenses but the Mob abducts the android.

title: Melodia's Siren Song
description: Quicksilver and Tally-Hawk race to rescue a hijacked freighter, but are forced to crash-land during a dust storm.

title: Tally-Hawk Returns
description: Hardware plots to kill Quicksilver by stealing the remote control that orders Tally-Hawk, and ordering the bird/weapon to attack its master.

title: Undercover
description: Mon*star aims to block the supply of oil to Limbo's artificial sun, and put his own reactor into place as the new Sun.

title: Eye of Infinity
description: Mon*star steals a dangerous crystal that can create extremely powerful forcefields but can't figure out how to activate it.

title: A Piece of the Action
description: The Mob threatens to flood Bedlam City unless the Governor pays it a percentage of the planet's income.

title: Flashback
description: Far in the future, a fledgling SilverHawk asks an aged Commander Stargazer how the SilverHawks were destroyed.

title: Super Birds
description: Mon*star orders Hardware to create a giant version of Sky-Shadow to destroy the SilverHawks.

title: The Blue Door
description: When the SilverHawks race to stop Mon*star from raiding the bank, they fall for the distraction as the real Mon*star makes a bid to infiltrate and destroy HawkHaven.

title: The Star of Bedlama
description: A valuable diamond becomes the object of desire for the Mob and the SilverHawks.

title: The Illusionist
description: Hotwing is hypnotizes and sent to destroy HawkHaven.

title: The Bounty Hunter Returns
description: The Bounty Hunter breaks free and sets up a base called Hanging Rock on an asteroid, preparing to attack once more.

title: The Chase
description: When Mo-Lec-U-Lar steals the key to Dolare's main vault, a wild chase ensues.

title: Switch
description: A cosmic storm reverses everyone's personalities, leaving the SilverHawks bad and the Mob good.

title: Junkyard Dog
description: Posing as a garbageman, Mo-Lec-U-Lar steals Stagazer's vital spare parts.

title: Window in Time
description: A time window allows Hardware to go back to the time on Earth when the SilverHawks are leaving for the Limbo Galaxy.

title: Gangwar: Part 1
description: Melodia and Poker-Face use remote-controlled cars to terrorze Mon*star and steal the casino bankroll. First of a two-part episode.

title: Gangwar: Part 2
description: The battered Mob plots a comeback by building the Sky Chomper, a vehicle that devours its own kind. Second of a two-part episode.

title: Sneak Attack: Part 1
description: Hotwing and Quicksilver attempt to sneak into Brim*star to arrest Mon*star. First of a two-part episode.

title: Sneak Attack: Part 2
description: Mon*star seeks revenge on those who jailed him. Second of a two-part episode.

title: Moon*Star
description: Mon*star gains new powers when he acquires a chunk of the Moon*star.

title: The Diamond Stick-Pin
description: Hardware gives Zeek a diamond stick-pin containing a remote-controlled bomb.

title: Burnout
description: Zero steals Professor Power's memory and takes over the artificial sun, which roasts HawkHaven when the doors jam.

title: Battle Cruiser
description: Mon*star plots to go to Chicago and take over the Earth mob.

title: Small World
description: Hardware plots to steal Automata and tow it out of the SilverHawks' jurisdiction, unaware that a mechanical fault in the planet will cause an explosion that will destroy Limbo Galaxy.

title: Stargazer's Refit
description: Outfitted with deadly meltdown discs, Mo-Lec-U-Lar is sent to destroy Commander Stargazer.

title: The Invisible Destroyer
description: Hardware threatens to destroy Bedlam with his invisible satellite.

title: The Harder They Fall
description: Mon*star plots to test a giant Sky-Shadow by having it tow the Penal Planet to Brim*star, where he will make all the prisoners members of the Mob.

title: Uncle Rattler
description: A snake-like criminal whose primary weapon is stun venom steals the SilverHawks' payroll before the Mob can get to it.

title: Zeek's Power
description: Zeek talks the Orb into giving him the magical powers intended for a weakening Hotwing and heads to the casino.

title: Airshow
description: Mon*star sets out to destroy the SilverHawks' airshow by having Mo-Lec-U-Lar masquerade as the Maraj.
